data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 4, Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 12, Artur Soares Dias awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Gil Vicente.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 15, In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Gil Vicente are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Famalicao's area.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 23, Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Joaquin Pereyra (Famalicao) has received a yellow card from Artur Soares Dias.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
In the minute 24, Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Famalicao's Gil Dias gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gil Vicente surge into the attack at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao but Antoine Leauteyâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Famalicao throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Famalicao push upfield but Artur Soares Dias quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 31, Famalicao drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 35, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Joaquin Pereyra (Famalicao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Famalicao's Joaquin Pereyra misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 38, Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 40, In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Antoine Leautey of Gil Vicente is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Claude Goncalves is on target to give Gil Vicente a 0-1 advantage.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Famalicao are caught offside.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 44, Artur Soares Dias signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
The home team replace Joao Neto with Jhonata Robert.
In the minute 47, Gil Vicente pushes forward through Lourency, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 52, Famalicao advance rapidly upfield but Artur Soares Dias blows for offside.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Famalicao are pushing forward but Ivan Jaime's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Gil Vicente needs to be cautious. Famalicao have an attacking throw-in.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 56, Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Joao Pedro Sousa is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Guga replacing Joaquin Pereyra.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
In the minute 66, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 75, Anderson Silva is replacing Ruben Del Campo for the home team.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a fourth substitution, with Edwin Herrera replacing Dani Morer.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Gil Vicente.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Famalicao's Ruben Lameiras gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
In the minute 80, Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gil Vicente's half?
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Anderson Silva of Famalicao gets in a strike, but is off target.
Famalicao's Anderson Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 84, Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Antoine Leautey with Kanya Fujimoto. This is the first substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 87, Gil Vicente's Samuel Dias Lino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Artur Soares Dias awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Vitor Carvalho is replacing Claude Goncalves for Gil Vicente at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 88, Gil Vicente make their third substitution with Rodrigao Prado replacing Lucas Mineiro.
Gil Vicente are coming forward and Lourency gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 89, Anderson Silva for Famalicao is whistled offside.
Free kick Famalicao.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Famalicao, close to Gil Vicente's area.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Joao Afonso (Gil Vicente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Renan Oliveira is on a sub for Samuel Dias Lino for Gil Vicente.
